ComicInfo.Penciller: Doug Mahnke,Leopoldo Durañona,Rich Hedden,Tom McWeeney,Leopoldo Durañona,Rich Hedden,Tom McWeeney,Doug Mahnke
ComicInfo.Summary: First up in this month's issue of Dark Horse's acclaimed anthology title: Leopoldo's Duranona's epic Race of Scorpions! Our intrepid trio "Return to Belea" where their adventure began, only to become the prisoners of a band of pirates who have taken over the town! Also, fans of Roachmill take note: Rich Hedden and Tom McWeeney take the `50s B-horror flick one step further in "For Better or for Worse"! And in Homicide, a trail of severed heads leads Detective Will Ford into his strangest case ever!
ComicInfo.Title: Race of Scorpions Part V; For Better or for Worse; A Gift of Life
ComicInfo.Writer: John Arcudi,Leopoldo Durañona,Rich Hedden,Tom McWeeney,Leopoldo Durañona,Rich Hedden,Tom McWeeney,John Arcudi
